## ShaderHelper.setClipSpacePosition() method

Sets the clip space position in vertex shader

**Signature:**

```typescript
static setClipSpacePosition(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, pos: PBShaderExp): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  pos | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The clip space position to be set |

void
